name: Westward Ho
overview: You are a turn of the century pioneer, trying to cross the country in a covered wagon. Decisions have to be made about purchasing food, supplies and ammunition. Various experiences: hunting, Native American attacks, settlements occurred on each leg of the journey. By playing the games several times, you learned where to spend money, how to hunt and where to trust strangers. Luck, however, was a factor in success, just as it was in reality.
